name: SlowInvasion
description:
Hey,

this is our game for the Ludum Dare 41

The game:

- Slow Invasion is the first turn based endless runner where you play as an ufo

- Collect as many cows as possible

- Be careful about traffic cones - they are dangerous while flying fast

Credits:

Game by:
JVolonte & dasPanjo

Main Theme by:  BoxCat Games

Thank you for playing!
